text: [Music]
the reason I think it's a terrible model
is not a new thing right it's something
we've known for thousands of years which
is we cannot specify our objectives
completely incorrectly and you know if
you look at the legend of King Midas he
specifies his objective I want
everything I touch to turn to gold
you know the gods or you could say the
AI system gives him the objective
exactly as he specifies and then of
course his food and his drink and his
family all turn to cold Neeta ice misery
starvation unexpected consequences right
you know that's the thing right it's
always unanticipated consequences
accidental side-effects collateral
damage externalities is what the
economists call it but it's a pervasive
problem we've known about it for a long
time you know that's why your third wish
is always please undo the first two
wishes because I've ruined everything
right
